mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, category_id = #{categoryId}, status = #{status, typeHandler=world.ssafy.tourtalk.model.typehandler.GenericEnumTypeHandler, javaType=world.ssafy.tourtalk.model.dto.enums.BoardStatus} WHERE post_id = #{postId}
UPDATE board_details SET file_path = #{filePath}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE post_id = #{postId}
mapper.select: SELECT b.post_id, b.title, b.content, b.view_count, b.comment_count, b.category_id, b.writer_id, b.status, d.created_at, d.updated_at, d.deleted_at, d.file_path FROM board b JOIN board_details d ON b.post_id = d.post_id WHERE b.post_id = #{postId}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE post_id = #{postId}

mapper.select:
SELECT b.post_id, b.title, b.content, b.view_count, b.comment_count, b.category_id, b.writer_id, d.created_at, d.updated_at, d.deleted_at, d.file_path FROM board b JOIN board_details d ON b.post_id = d.post_id WHERE b.status = 'ACTIVE'
AND b.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cond.keyword}, '%')
AND b.writer_id = #{cond.writerId}
AND b.category_id = #{cond.categoryId}
ORDER BY d.created_at ASC
ORDER BY d.created_at DESC
ORDER BY d.updated_at ASC
ORDER BY d.updated_at DESC
ORDER BY b.view_count ASC
ORDER BY b.view_count DESC
ORDER BY d.created_at DESC
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
